location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Sir Bartle Frere

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Sir Bartle's departure from his position as Governor of Bombay and his forthcoming role on the Council of India.The letter also discusses the need for a new agent at Muskat and the decision by the Government of India to view the question of Augam [Henjam] as one of purely telegraphic interest and not to pursue the possibilities of a free port and coal depot there.
